Ce clip, puisque c'est ce qu'il est tant par son contenu que sa durée, est parfait pour une immersion complète dans un monde onirique et musical. Il permet une approche de la Réalité Virtuelle en fanfare.
Vous n'avez rien à y faire, simplement vous asseoir et vous laisser porter par les images et la voix.
Cette expérience ne pourra que convertir les néophytes du genre et leur donner un aperçu de ce que cette technologie peut dorénavant apporter d'innovant dans les jeux.

38239579.review:
[h1]Played On: [b]HTC Vive[/b][/h1]

Senza Peso is in limbo somewhere between being a game, and a short film, and as such it's somewhat hard to describe. The developer has referred to it as a "mini opera", which is quite accurate seeing as the musical track is modern opera meets rock, somewhere in the vein of Nightwish or Within Temptation. The journey tells a story of a soul, your soul, as it transitions in to the afterlife, seemingly through the River Styx from Greek mythology.

This release seems to be made out of all low-quality, prerendered graphics that play out in one large cutscene; think Final Fantasy 7, 8, and 9 cutscenes from the original Playstation era. However, among these landscapes are humans that have been captured in FMV sequences and placed in to the renders, somewhat akin to the early Mortal Kombat titles. Due to the low quallity nature of the title, Senza Peso does have quite a blurry aspect to it that somewhat hinders the overall experience.

That being said, Senza Peso is one of the better free short films available. The entire experience is very dream-like, and there's not much else like it on Steam at the moment. However, the game does like to stay active in the background, thus my inaccurate 1.6 hours on record, so once you close it down make sure that it's off; otherwise your friends may think you enjoyed this a little too much. It's worth the download if you're looking for something short and different to watch while deciding what to play next.

[h1]Rating: [b]3.0/5.0[/b] - Average, can take it or leave it.[/h1]
The Virtual Reality Network [url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/31311814/]Curator[/url] | [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/thevirtualrealitynetwork]Group[/url] Click for More

32071463.review:
Senza Peso is a short VR boat ride experience, you  basically look around you for real life actors blending with computer animation, listen to a nice opera in the background and enjoy the ride.


Pros:
Pretty
Good soundtrack

Cons:
Short
No interactive elements
Not a game

Verdict:
If I had paid for this, I would have felt ripped off, as it all ends in a few minutes and there is no replay value. But since it is free for everyone I totally recommend you enjoy the ride while it lasts as a lot of love and effort went into making it.

Final Score: 8/10 for free product VR demo.

30225874.review: Sensa Peso is similar to a Disney "It's a small world" in terms of concept. It's rather well put together but I feel it's let down by the hardware limitations (vive). The vistas it aims to offer all fall short due to the screen door effect, but really what killed the immersion for me was how 'flat' the backgrounds looked - I just couldn't shake of the sense that the sky, mountains, etc were all 10 yards away, painted on a sphere. Disapointing, although probably not so much the fault of the developer rather than limiting hardware.

28230112.review:
This isn't a GAME so much as an incredibly well-done VR music video.
While the opera music IS cool, the real reason I found this VR title noteworthy is because every HTC Vive title I've played so far I've found SEVERELY underwhelming in terms of making use of their graphics capabilities. This totally lives up to expectations.

[spoiler] Everyone else in my household who has been playing VR titles has been like "aw man wow it's like you're actually there" -- and while I do find VR immersive, I don't find it as believable as they do currently-- or jump at scary VR things-- or... any of that. You would THINK it would be the opposite because I have some mental illness issues with occasional psychosis and all-- I guess the alternate realities I "hallucinate" are just much more real-looking than the typical VR stuff and so it all looks fake to me... [/spoiler]

ANYWAY-- point is, they made amazing use of graphics-- which should be easy considering it's largely a completely computer generated video for a VR music video-- but they really deliver. There were some parts that felt a little too real to me. Haha. It was very enjoyable. I can't wait until games look this good.

Simply Dazzling!!

I just have to say WELL DONE to the development team that put this experience together! I was super-impressed with the visuals and audio. Just when you think the experience is going to stay calm and possibly get boring, it absolutely does not - it keeps you engaged and dazzled with imagery! It's so fantastic that now instead of paying an arm and a leg only to wait in line for hours at an amusement park, developers can give us even more exciting experiences right in our home VR room - WELL DONE, DEV!!!!

26022635.review: This a fun few minutes great showing of how nice a presentationc an be with sound and great visuals.

26019810.review: I could have sworn I saw Rick Harrison from Pawn Stars.

26011905.review:
Still got chills running down my spine.

Wow.

26007121.review: You have to get this.  It's free and it's amazing.  Everything looked phenomenal and its a great, quick VR experience.  My only warning is it is a "railed" or "roller coaster" experience so if your VR legs arent strong yet maybe save this one for later.  I think most people will be very comfortable though as the performance is great.  Maybe sit in a chair while you do it if your more comfortable.  I have a lot of VR hours under my belt but this actually gave me goosebumps.  I want to shake the developer's hand for this one.  And the music was FANTASTIC.  I am an experienced musician and the soundtrack blew me away.  There is really no reason not to get this as it is free.  It's something you can save for when you want to show your friends VR.  Enjoy.

26006761.review: Ein kurzer aber nach wie vor (habe diese Experience schon mit den beiden Oculus Developer Kits genossen) sehr schöner "Opern Trip" durch eine bizzare Welt. Danke für die Vive Version und mehr davon!

26004570.review:
I thought Id give this a look sence it was free, and it was was pretty cool. Check it out, its just a 6-7 min experience or check out my youtube video of the full thing here, https://youtu.be/gMhw1VVUelY
PS its WAY better in the Vive!

26001277.review: This was amazing. My wife and I were blown away by the immersion, special effects, and graphics. I am running on a gtx 1080 i5 4690k 16 GB ram

25994596.review:
Very different kind of experience from most of the other demos out there in a surprisingly good way!
I went to hell, and it actually felt kinda freaky. Couple of towers reminds me of Lord of the ring towers!
Opera music was very fitting. There's some people doing weird stuff in here, and the people look real.
Excellent job developer/s. Thanks for allowing us to experience this! 
Please note there's no interaction, just sit back  or stand and enjoy!

25992000.review:
Let me start by saying the idea of opera has never been my thing, but i tried this due to its free nature and i must say it was a visual and audio feast. Trully beautiful..

 The only problems i had were the htc ear buds not being able to handle the final seconds of audio ( crackled) but id say thats a limitation of cheaper ear buds. Also the app crashed when i exited it but minor gripes on something trully awe inspiring..

25991835.review:
This was a pretty cool experience.

I think it would be pretty cool to start seeing some music videos done in this fashion.

25991578.review: Un sacré voyage ! Tout simplement splendide, riche en émotions, une des expériences les plus marquantes que j'ai pu vivre en RV ! Et c'est gratuit... Mille merci !

25990612.review:
This is awesome!
I wish it was longer, i really enjoyed it :)

25990372.review: Freaking awesome, I never done acid but this is what it's probably like!  We need more content like this they don't all have to be games.  Also I was worried the giant head was going to sneeze on me but was disappointed he didn't try to lick me!

25990100.review:
Short but amazing. The bar has just been set very high for vive tech demos to follow. 
(If only it were supersampled)

25988970.review: short and boring, graphics so and so

25988334.review: Loved every moment of this beautiful experience.

25987223.review: Only a couple of minutes long but I feel like a criminal playing this for free. Very nice concept peice that I think if it was a few minutes longer should be being sold for a buck or two. A graphical journey through some fantasy enviroments with some nice music adding to the experience. Thanks for sharing with us :-)

25986912.review:
Eine ziemlich abgefahrene Reise durch fremde Welten. Man kann zwar nicht interagieren, aber man kann die "Fahrt" durch die Welt mit tollen Effekten trotzdem genießen. Da das "Spiel" kostenlos ist, absolut zu empfehlen. Sieht gut von der Grafik schick aus und läuft flüssig!

[u]Positive Merkmale:[/u]
[list]
    	[*] Abgefahrene Welten, durch die man reist
    	[*] Schicke Grafik für VR-Verhältnisse
	[*] kostenlos
	[*] flüssig und keine Motion Sickness
[/list]

[u]Negative Merkmale:[/u]
[list]
	[*] sehr kurz
[/list]

Ich habe auch ein Let's Play in meinem [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3ok91FKp_SAtxhz63Ti3KQ]YouTube-Kanal[/url] aufgenommen:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ml8xUIcPeII

25986786.review: It's amazing how well this stands the test of time! Still one of my favorite VR experiences! Great job guys, thanks!!!!!

25986169.review: Bravo!  This immediately gets into my introduce people to VR rotation.  Nice graphics, music. Excellent experience.

25985439.review: No esta mal aunque es muy corto.

25985276.review:
Schönes Demo, eine nette Reise in die Fantasie. Sollte man mal gesehen haben nur Höhenangst sollte man nicht 
haben ;-)
Auf jeden Fall ein Demo, was man VR Interessierten vorführen sollte.

LG

25984944.review: Eine richtig nette VR Erfahrung! Auf jeden Fall zu empfehlen, vor allem da es kostenlos ist. Und genießt es im sitzen! :)

很短的DEMO 但是優美歌曲旋律&視覺得大餐饗宴
 超採開3.0 非常享受  免費的沒甚麼好說的 值得體驗!

25983540.review: Beautiful experience, we need more of this vr experience, very beautiful and haunting

25983090.review:
I remember trying this for the first time on my DK2 a long time ago. Now it's back more beautiful than ever. It's a magical journey you can enjoy both sitting and standing. Great to show of VR to new people and a must watch even for experienced VR enthusiasts. You will not regret downloading this free journey.

Ran smooth on i7 6700, 980ti, 1.4 supersampling.

25981342.review: I realy like this ! Please make more of these fantastic demo's !

39511812.review:
Dive into a spiritual journey with Senza Peso. Just sit down and enjoy!
The camera movement can be quite fast and the player/spectator is not always on the ground so
motion sickness might occur for first time VR players here.
